title: AIOU extends convocation registration deadline to Oct 15
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 05 (APP): Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) extended the registration deadline for its 2025 Convocation till October 15.
Graduates from the Autumn 2022 to Autumn 2024 semesters would be eligible to participate in the upcoming ceremony, said a statement on issued on Sunday.
The university has also announced a 50% fee concession for disable students, while PhD degree holders and medalists will be permitted to bring one guest to the event.
Students were also guided to complete their registration through the official portal convocation.aiou.edu.pk.
AIOU has advised students who have already submitted their applications but have not yet paid the fee to deposit it immediately to confirm their participation.
